TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that user is able to run 'User Defined Report' and is able to retrieve crash count.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click 'Crash' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click 'Crash' tab.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click 'Crash' tab.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop No of vehicles field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop No of vehicles field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop No of vehicles field to rows section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop No of vehicles field to rows section.

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Drag and drop No of casualties field to column section.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to drag and drop No of casualties field to column section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to drag and drop No of casualties field to column section.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to drag and drop No of casualties field to column section.

TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to click on run button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to click on run button.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to click on run button.
